name: create grid
desc: The create_grid module produces a 2D or 3D uniform grid.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Grid Type
properties.desc: The Grid Type control allows the user to select between creating a 2D or 3D grid.

properties.name: X Resolution
properties.desc: The X Resolution is the number of nodes in the x direction.

properties.name: Y Resolution
properties.desc: The Y Resolution is the number of nodes in the y direction.

properties.name: Z Resolution
properties.desc: The Z Resolution is the number of nodes in the z direction.

properties.name: Grid Rotation
properties.desc: The Grid Rotation allows you to rotate the grid about its center point by a set Azimuth and Inclination.

properties.name: Center Point
properties.desc: The Center Point is the location of the center of the grid. It is also used as a center of rotation for the grid.

properties.name: I Size
properties.desc: The I Size value controls the size of the grid in the x direction before rotation.

properties.name: J Size
properties.desc: The I Size value controls the size of the grid in the y direction before rotation.

properties.name: K Size
properties.desc: The I Size value controls the size of the grid in the z direction before rotation.
